reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic and well-made, with one noting it looks like a $100 dress. The fit is fantastic, with one customer mentioning it hits right at the ankles, and they appreciate the material quality, with one noting it's perfect for winter wear. Customers describe the dress as comfortable, with one highlighting its thick knit material, and they like its pretty color, particularly the white and black wool version. While some customers find it flattering, others say it doesn't flatter their body shape. The material thickness receives mixed feedback, with some describing it as fairly thick while others find it thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant optical pleats, but thin fabric needs layering
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This ZESICA long sleeve sweater dress is a gorgeous piece, especially in the orange red with white contrast hemline. The pleating in the skirt is actually an optical trick created by the weave, which is brilliant â€” it gives the look of pleats without the hassle, making the dress easy to wash, iron, and wear. I ordered my usual medium, and it fits perfectly. That said, the unlined sweater material is quite thin. It shows every curve â€” whether you like it or not â€” and it also reveals bra straps and panty lines. To keep the look polished, some sort of shaper or slip is necessary. I paired mine with a white blazer, which helped conceal undergarment lines, added warmth, and elevated my office look to executive level. The dress itself sparkles in versatility: flattering fit; soft, comfortable fabric; elegant design; and effortless styling for weddings, cocktail parties, or work. With the right layering, it transitions beautifully from day to evening. And at this price, itâ€™s a true value find â€” stylish, wellâ€‘made, and accessible without sacrificing elegance. Read more
items.author: Anna Gone Shopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really lovely
items.body: Gorgeous and warm! Fairly thick and soft.Fits like a glove and displays my curves nicely! Read more
items.author: Christy M.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality Zesica Maxi Sweater Dress
items.body: Nice dress. More midi than maxi. Classic style. Good quality. The dress fits closely to the body and runs true to size. If you are between sizes, or have a large bust, hips and waist, order a size up or wear a shaper for a smooth fit. Launder gently to maintain quality, shape and integrity of the fabric. Read more
items.author: Angela K.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: This dress is absolutely adorable. Fits great. I am 5' 8" and 140 lbs. I purchased the small and it fits perfectly. The material is mid quality and will hold up for quite some time. I received numerous compliments. I would say if you are on the shorter side you may want to pass. The dress falls about 5 inches above my ankle. Read more
items.author: Dawn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like a GLOVE
items.body: This dress is perfection on me. It fits like a glove and itâ€™s the perfect length. I may buy an all colors in the future. Read more
items.author: Julia

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars ribbed dress
items.body: the dress is ribbed and tight. It was see through for me, and not a good fit. Other than that, it is exactly as shown in the picture and it is super comfortable and soft, for people with sensitive skin like me IF those two things do not bother you, then I say go for it! The color matches correctly and it is a nice style for those that ribbed works well for. There are no pockets. Read more
items.author: Useful items

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Nice fabric and fit. Looks more expensive than I paid for it. Read more
items.author: Lona

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great find!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I really love this ZESICA sweater dress! The ribbed knit fabric feels soft and cozyâ€”great for cooler fall days. The pleated A-line design adds a flattering silhouette, and the crewneck gives it a classic, timeless look. Itâ€™s versatile enough to dress up for weddings or wear casually with boots. The length is perfect as a maxi dress, and it fits true to size. Iâ€™ve gotten several compliments while feeling comfortable all day. Overall, this dress is a stylish and practical addition to my fall wardrobe. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Alexis

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Wine, Navy, Khaki, Pink, Peacock Blue, Fuchsia, Apricot, Army Green, Orange Red, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
